text: irisumi ya semayatinina midirini besidisiti k’enochi wisit’i yefet’ere newi፡፡ ‘arishumi bewiha layi neberi፡፡ yetinyachihu sirawi yamare mehonuni yifetinachihu zenidi (fet’erachewi)፡፡ «inanite kemoti behwala be’irigit’i tek’esik’ashochi nachihu» bitilimi ineziya yekaduti yihi gilits’i digimiti iniji lela ayidelemi yilalu፡፡
